name: playbg-platform
description: Online Backgammon Platform - Full-stack application with real-time gameplay

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:game-logic && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:shared: cd packages/shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:game-logic: cd packages/game-logic && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:shared && npm run build:game-logic && cd apps/backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd apps/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:mobile: cd apps/mobile && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
